original_text: And he took the elders of the city, and thorns of the wilderness and briers, and with them he taught the men of Succoth.
korean_text: 그 성읍의 장로들을 붙잡아 들가시와 찔레로 숙곳 사람들을 징벌하고

sentences.original_text: And he took the elders of the city
and thorns of the wilderness and briers
and with them he taught the men of Succoth
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들을 가지고 그가 숙곳 사람들을 가르쳤다
